>> A typical piston cylinder arrangement with both inlet port and exhaust port closed is:<< ( ) An Open System (x) A Closed System ( ) An Isolated System
[explanation] In a typical piston cylinder arrangement with inlet and output port closed, mass cannot flow in or out, but heat transfer can happen across the boundaries. [explanation]
